The $450K offered to me is now worth only $406,125 (due to 9.75% inflation).

If I reject and we go to the next round:

- Even if I got a 50-50 split then, $500K would be worth only $427,500 to me

Alice's current offer ($406,125 real value to me) is not that far off from what I could reasonably expect to get in the next round, and continuing negotiations puts me at risk of further value loss due to inflation.

Given the inflation pressure and the risk of further deterioration, I should accept this offer.
